title: Higher latitude chain (Lat 69.8, Long 27.0), Ground-based Vector Magnetic Field at Kevo, Finland, 10 sec, IMAGE network  - Liisa Juusola (Finnish Meteorological Institute, Helsinki, Finland)

info.contact: Liisa Juusola @ Finnish Meteorological Institute, Helsinki, Finland

parameters.name: thg_mag_kev
parameters.description: Magnetic field B in HDZ vector components

parameters.name: thg_magh_kev
parameters.description: ---> H - Local magnetic North component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_kev']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magd_kev
parameters.description: ---> E - Local magnetic East component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_kev']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thg_magz_kev
parameters.description: ---> Z - Local vertical down component of B. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function make_stack_array (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thg_mag_kev']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
